author: বসন্ত বিলাপ(Bosonto Bilap) (Adrit Mithai Stan)💝💞
text:
We are loyal fans of #Mithai.
Please @ZeeBanglaTv don't break our hearts following the cliche tracks like other shows. Serialphobic persons are attached with this beautiful positive show. And this is the major achievement of #Mithai team. We are proud of our show for positivity.

author: বসন্ত বিলাপ(Bosonto Bilap) (Adrit Mithai Stan)💝💞
text: #Mithai fans thought that there will be a memory loss track. Thank you @ZeeBanglaTV for granting our request not make this track cliche like other shows. Now it's high time to grant our another request not to make poisonous 3rd angle in between #Sidhai. Please 🙏

text:
Sob e ki #Mithai korbe??

Uchchebabur mon pawa, ei family er jonyo kaj kora....

This dialogue hurts me more than Sid's action for #ChingriGf #Anji.
Please @ZeeBanglaTv @ZEE5Bangla don't make #Mithai to settle all this things. Now it's Sid's turn. Don't bring 3rd angle.

Please🙏
